text:
@GavinNewsom Dear @GavinNewsom,
Please tell me what your research is on how long #Covid19 can live on sand. And if you don’t have this information, hope you get it.
—#JenniferElster
#Americanhistory #ReduceRiskReduceExposure
CC @gatesfoundation @BillGates @NYGovCuomo @melindagates @NYTimesPR
